thread.title: Accused school deputy shown in Parkland shooting video

title: Accused school deputy shown in Parkland shooting video
text:
Accused school deputy shown in Parkland shooting video Thursday, March 15, 2018 - 01:26 
Broward County Sheriff's Office released surveillance video Thursday showing Scot Peterson, the armed deputy assigned to Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, standing outside as the shooting occurred. Peterson has said he didn't enter the building, because he believed the gunfire was coming from outside. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
